passage.title: A rabbit
passage.paragraph: Hello, everyone! I'm a little rabbit. My name is Hanhan.

Look! I'm very lovely. My eyes are red. My ears are long. My hair is white. My tail is short. I like carrots very much. I have a good friend. She's my little master. Her name is Lisa. We always play games together. I like her very much and she likes me, too.
